channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- vTM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- vTM

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-08-15T15:14:33.426Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-08-13T18:17:47.248Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.
